name: Association of Big Industrial Energy Consumers Romania
memberOrga: ABIEC members: Saint Gobain Romania, Tenaris Silcotub, ArcelorMittal Galati, CRH Romania, Alro SA Slatina, Doosan IMGB SA
goal: ABIEC represents the voice of Romanian big energy industry consumers on all matters relevant for their industrial competitiveness - such as energy, trade, climate change, industrial policy.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- A policy framework for climate and energy in the period from 2020 to 2030 (COM/2014/015)
- Proposal for a decision concerning the establishment and operation of a market stability reserve for the Union
greenhouse gas emission trading scheme (COM/2014/020)
- Initiatives under the Clean Energy Package
- Proposal amending Directive 2003/87/EC to enhance cost-effective emission reduction and low-carbon investments (COM/2015/337)
